We’re a powerful team with a simple approach

Learn

We immerse ourselves in our client’s world to understand exactly what they need to gain a competitive advantage. Whether that’s tangible improvements in ROI, or softer, less tangible refinement of their presentation in the marketplace.

Craft

We treat each project as a unique challenge; turning what we learn into a set of tailored, practical solutions that target objectives. We also adapt our process to work effectively and efficiently with each client and service partners.

Grow

We are certified

We squeeze the most from magento

JH has been a Magento Silver Solution Partner since the scheme’s inception. Our long-standing experience with Magento Enterprise Edition is fortified by the official Magento Certified qualification held by every JH developer and all junior developers are certitied within six months as part of our training program. This foundation of expertise is complemented by specialist eCommerce capabilities that add value to every project:
